detail_desc: Sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a raw edge around the armholes and a rounded hem.

Short blouse in a crinkled, patterned weave with a deep neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the hems, and a seam at the hem that is elasticated at the back.
Cigarette trousers in a viscose weave with a regular waist with that is elasticated at the back, side pockets and tapered legs with grosgrain side stripes.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Wide, sleeveless dress in softly draping jersey. Unlined.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidery at the top, a small stand-up collar, cut-out section at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with flounces at the elbows and elasticated cuffs, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Partly lined.

Top in supersoft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline. Longer at the back. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Lace underwired bra with decorative straps at the front and mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Wide adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened together at the back and a slightly wider hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with lightly padded cups and a V-neck with frill trims that continue over the shoulders. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross over at the back.
Bag in braided paper straw containing glittery threads with embroidery, appliqués and pompoms on one side and two handles at the top. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Height 17 cm. Width 28 cm.
Cardigan in a soft moss knit with a shawl collar, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and ribbed trims. No buttons.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.

Rain mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Elastication at the top and an elastic strap with a press-stud around the wrists. Fleece lining. Size 2-6M with no thumbs. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and front pockets.
Treggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Mittens in soft leather with covered elastication at the cuffs. Fine-knit lining in a cashmere blend.
Sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at the top, front and back.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit hat in soft wool with a pompom on top.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and press-stud and detachable belt. Pleats at the front, side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a pleated stand-up collar and a small opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with pleated, buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side and a gathered seam at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved T-shirts in ribbed organic cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs and an overlocked hem.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Straight-cut utility shirt in twill made from a soft Tencel™ lyocell blend in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar and classic front. Flap chest pockets with a pleat, shoulder tabs with a button, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem.

Set with a jacket and pair of joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey. Jacket with side pockets, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and ribbing around the neckline.
Hair elastics without metal clips. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap patch pockets with a press-stud and two back vents with press-studs. Lined.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs with wide, elasticated ribbing at the hems.
Short-sleeved top in a soft, fine knit with buttons on one shoulder and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Sports top in heavy jersey with taped details. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, short sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut skirt in sturdy, stretch, printed jersey with a chunky zip in one side. Bonded inside. Unlined.
Short teddy coat in soft faux fur with a high collar, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Short necklace in different designs of thin metal chains. Adjustable length, 29-37 cm.
Plastic water bottle with a non-drip, push-button lid and a practical carry strap at the top. Capacity 600 ml.

Suit trousers woven in a viscose blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slightly shorter legs with stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour, and creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with a small frilled collar with a drawstring and opening at the top, and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Fitted top in fast-drying, functional fabric with short sleeves and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a photographic print on the front, lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and trousers in soft cotton twill. Top with buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Ankle boots in imitation suede. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Silicone trim at the top, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in airy chiffon with flounces down the front and back, a V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined. The polyester content of the chiffon is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in a patterned organic cotton weave. Dress with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a wrapover and cut-out section at the back and buttons at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a pleated skirt. Lined. Puff pants with elastication at the waist and hems. Unlined.
Short skirt in crinkled chiffon with an elasticated waist and small frill trim at the top. Lined.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with a glittery finish. Zip at the top and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Size 4x12x20 cm.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck, ties and buttons at the front. 3/4-length sleeves and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a decorative knot at the front and elastic with a metal fastener at the back. Width approx. 4 cm.
Wide, slightly shorter hooded top in pile with dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, and text print on the front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with eyelets and crossover satin ribbons. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Beach dress in sturdy, printed jersey with deep armholes and short sleeves. Draping over the sleeves and down the sides, gathered elastication at the waist, and a rounded hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Slightly shorter top with a bodice in soft jersey and sleeves in crisp cotton poplin. V-neck, a wrapover, draped front with a concealed zip in one side, and a square neckline at the back. Long puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication around the shoulders and at the cuffs. Partly lined.
V-neck top in airy slub linen jersey. Short dolman sleeves with a slit and ties, and a straight-cut hem.

Quilted, lightly padded, boxy-style jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, welt side pockets, dropped shoulders, ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a deep neckline front and back and short sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat woven in a wool blend with wide notch lapels and long raglan sleeves. Large patch front pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit organic cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Soft terry inside.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.

Short dress in burnout-patterned sweatshirt fabric with a raw-edge neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Visible seam down the back with a zip at the bottom and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Top, hooded jacket and a pair of joggers in soft organic cotton. Jacket with a lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut dress in a soft, patterned weave with a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Gently flared skirt with a seam and asymmetric flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Two iron-on fabric patches to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 12 cm.

GUPPYFRIEND laundry bag is designed to capture microplastics from synthetic garments in your machine wash. These plastics would otherwise enter rivers, lakes and oceans, but instead are captured inside the bag. Put your laundry inside the bag and wash as normal. Size 50x74 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleat at the front and a double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Dress in patterned viscose twill with a round neckline and a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication and a gathered frill trim at the cuffs. Wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Cotton chinos with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and slim legs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
